channel.title: How to play "Still Alive" in L4D campaign "The Sacrifice"
channel.description:
Lol I found out today about 10 mins ago when I were playing "The Sacrifice" on L4D. I walked around in one of the houses in the last map when I discovered a jukebox, I pressed it and I saw a disc comming down and being put to be played and then I started, it was the song from portal "Still Alive". Just so you guys know :stuck_out_tongue:
Also have Valve put this song in any other Valve game? (except for Portal, and Portal 2)

item.title: How to play "Still Alive" in L4D campaign "The Sacrifice"
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
xalener:

I did it in the 360 version of the perish within a week of the game’s release.

Upon further recollection, it was actually the demo. Before release.

Read full topic
